short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Intelligent Bookmark finder! Just describe it in your own words and it will find the most relevant bookmarks for you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
IntelliMark; Now browsing understands you, not just your words.

To use this extension, type "aim " in the address bar.

Search your bookmarks in any language - the AI will match relevant results no matter how you describe them. Just type a few keywords in the address bar and find pages instantly.

The IntelliMark indexing engine uses state-of-the-art natural language processing to build semantic index of your bookmarks. No more scrolling through endless folders. No more cryptic URLs to remember. Just intelligent search powered by AI.

Key Features:
    Omnibox search finds bookmarks in seconds! Just type "aim" in address bar.
    Multilingual support: Describe what you are looking for in any language or even with typos. 
    Clean, intuitive interface.
    Use the default provided API to enable AI or just use your own openai key or azure deployment!

Take back control of your digital life with intelligence. Get the IntelliMark - the future of browser productivity!

PLEASE USE YOUR OWN API KEY IF YOU HAVE ONE. IF YOU USE THE DEFAULT API, CONSIDER DONATING! I WILL PROVIDE THE DETAILS LATER!
